name: Custom Database Applications by Caspio
author: Caspio

sections.description:
Note: This plugin has been deprecated because Caspio’s standard “Embed” method supports deployment on WordPress. Learn more about Caspio deployment methods.

Caspio is the world’s leading cloud platform for building online database applications without coding. Create web forms, searchable databases, custom reports, KPI dashboards, multi-user portals, location-based apps and custom business software — all without writing code. Applications can be seamlessly embedded into any website, intranet or portal while Caspio silently powers them behind the scenes.

For information about Caspio, visit the official website at https://www.caspio.com.
sections.installation: This plugin is no longer available because Caspio’s standard “Embed” deployment supports WordPress.
sections.faq:
Where do I get help and other information about Caspio?

For more information about Caspio, see the official site at https://www.caspio.com.
sections.changelog:
2.2

Updated for WordPress plugin deprecation in Caspio

2.1

Added async embed deployment support

2.0

Initial public release. Replaces earlier Caspio Deployment Control plugin.

short_description: Enables shortcodes for embedded deployment of Caspio database applications.
